data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Almeida, Marlus Queiroz, Salvatierra, Lidianne, Morais, José Wellington De (2018): A new species of Masteria L. Koch, 1873 (Dipluridae: Masteriinae) from Guyana. Zootaxa 4434 (2): 366-368, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4434.2.6|3 occurrences
